articles.author: Frances Vinall
articles.title: South Africa denies illegal miners food and water to force them out - The Washington Post
articles.description: Officials are blocking access to basic supplies for hundreds of people underground in a northwest mine shaft as part of a crackdown on miners.
articles.content: South African authorities have been criticized over a controversial tactic to force illegal miners hiding more than a mile underground in the countrys northwest to the surface by cutting off their ac… [+5942 chars]

articles.author: MIKE STOBBE
articles.title: US health officials report 1st case of new form of mpox in a traveler - The Associated Press
articles.description: Health officials say they have confirmed the first U.S. case of a new form of mpox that was first seen in eastern Congo. Authorities said Saturday the risk to the public is low. The person had traveled to eastern Africa and was treated in California. Official…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Health officials said Saturday they have confirmed the first U.S. case of a new form of mpox that was first seen in eastern Congo.
